title: Web Development Course
description: Learn the basics of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
overview: This course covers the core concepts of web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's designed for beginners looking to build static and dynamic websites.
learningPoints: Understand the structure of HTML documents
Master CSS for styling and layout
Build responsive websites using media queries
Implement basic web forms and user input handling

title: Frontend Development Course
description: Master frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Redux.
overview: This course covers everything you need to become a proficient frontend developer, from the basics of HTML and CSS to building interactive user interfaces with React.js.
learningPoints: Learn advanced CSS and Flexbox/Grid layout

title: Backend Development Course
description: Learn backend development with JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
overview: This course teaches backend development using JavaScript, focusing on Node.js for server-side programming, Express.js for building APIs, and MongoDB for database management.

title: MERN Stack Development Course
description: Build full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
overview: This comprehensive course covers the MERN stack, teaching you how to create dynamic web applications with MongoDB for the database, Express.js for the backend framework, React.js for the frontend, and Node.js for server-side development.
